headline: How Leading Elevator Companies Respond When the Power Goes Out
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / June 3, 2025 / A look at the Otis response during the Spain and Portugal blackout When the power went out around noon on April 28, Otis mechanic Julio César was conducting an inspection in a Madrid office building. ...
